features.title: Template Rendering
features.description: Renders HTML templates using Go's template system (html/template). Full support for loops, conditionals and variables.

features.title: Fast Hot Reload
features.description: Instant changes in the browser with intelligent debouncing. No manual reloads, no excessive renders, maximum productivity.

features.title: Standalone Binary
features.description: A single binary with no external dependencies. Easy to distribute and deploy in any environment.
